name: Sizing Up
description:
A game developed by SFLC 1 ( and 2) for GameCraft 2016.

SFLC 1 Members: Marvin Chin, Alvin Ng, Neil Brian Labayna

SFLC 2 Members: Choo Wen Xin, Ng Tzer Bin

Theme - Close Enough

Instructions:

Click to make the circle fit in the larger circle. The size of the circle will reset when "close enough" is achieved, where the circle is almost matched accurately.
